summary: I really wasn't expecting elu fighting on Imane's season. Maybe on Elliot's season bc well we can see more about they...
question: I really wasn't expecting elu fighting on Imane's season. Maybe on Elliot's season bc well we can see more about they relationship but rn????it makes me sad
answer: Yeah, I remember answering a message a few months back when someone asked me if I would like to see Elu arguing and I said yes just to see how’d they interact with each other…. But honestly, this was me after going back and watching the clip again and hearing them yell at each other in the background:

summary: I loved SkamFr S3 so its disappointing to see how messy S4 is. The first half till Ep5 was ok but kinda repetitive, so I was...
question: I loved SkamFr S3 so its disappointing to see how messy S4 is. The first half till Ep5 was ok but kinda repetitive, so I was longing for drama. Now its ALL drama but not the interesting kind. Its sad because so many Fr S3 clips are exquisite to me, while Fr S4 is less engaging than OG S4. If they put Manon/Charles back together I will be done with SkamFr. S4 shows the Fr writing is not very good generally and only Elu chemistry might be strong enough to overcome that, if they have Eliott season
answer:
Hey babe,

I do think it’s starting to feel quite heavy and it’s lowkey exhausting everybody haha. I’m not really into cancel culture, so even if I do end up disliking the ending I’m not going to just disregard everything because I didn’t like it, especially since I’m well aware that there are people who are enjoying this season.

We’ll see though 🤷🏼‍♀️ there’s not much to do right now except wait and see ♡

summary: I hope you don’t mind me asking but how is Ingrid racist? I don’t remember her saying anything about it... i think there was one...
question: I hope you don’t mind me asking but how is Ingrid racist? I don’t remember her saying anything about it... i think there was one time but how is she different from daphne when she says messed up things sometimes?
answer: I don’t think she’s kkk racist but she is a nuisance and a little too bitchy and annoying for my taste. Her attitude is always a little off when Imane’s around and I’m not really here for the constant disrespect towards Imane’s home.

summary: I bet Imane really wants to know what elu were arguing about in relation to Idriss but I don’t know if she’ll make the first...
question: I bet Imane really wants to know what elu were arguing about in relation to Idriss but I don’t know if she’ll make the first move tomorrow? Will Lucas say something first especially if he now knows stuff or doesn’t and is still very suspicious? Because I don’t think Imane wants to open that can of worms of her own accord. I don’t think she’ll mention she went round to see Manon and overheard them arguing... I’m very curious about tomorrow but also scared. 👀
answer:
You got any thoughts or hopes on what you think is gonna happen during this talk Lucas and Imane will probably have tomorrow? I’m stressed about it tbh 😞 (2)

Second anon, I agree with the first anon that Lucas probably will be the one to start the conversation and call out Imane for not letting him know idriss and Eliott were friends. Which will prompt Imane to say that it’s not up to her and to talk to Eliott, and Lucas will explain that he did and will tell her about the fight. I am kind of peur but also more than ready for all of this to get resolved tbh so bring it on
